summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of West Stevens Street over and across a portion of Block 1, Mades 1st Addition to West Seattle, now a portion of the City of Seattle, and a portion of block 4, Stewart's 1st Addition to West Seattle, now a portion of the City of Seattle; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
